#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main ()
{
    long long int t = 0, a = 0, min = 1000000000, max = -1;
    long int n = 0, q = 0;
    scanf ("%ld %lld", &n, &t);
    while (n--)
    {
         scanf ("%lld", &a);
         if (a < min)
         {
              min = a;
         }
         if (a > max)
         {
              max = a;
         }
    }
    while (t--)
    {
         scanf ("%ld", &q);
         if ((q >= min) && (q <= max))
         {
              printf ("Yes\n");
         }
         else
         {
              printf ("No\n");
         }
    }

    return 0;
}
